channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Giuliani ordered to hand over New York City apartment, Mercedes, luxury watches to defamation victims
item.description: Rudy Giuliani had targeted two election workers with false claims as part of his efforts to overturn Donald Trump's 2020 loss to President Joe Biden.

item.title: Starbucks shares slide after coffee chain says sales fell again, suspends outlook
item.description: The company's same-store sales slid for the third consecutive quarter, fueled by a 10% tumble in traffic to its North American stores.

item.title: This ETF has trounced the S&P 500 with bets on AI in a surprising sector
item.description: Macrae Sykes of Gabelli Funds explains his strategy, which looks beyond the Nvidia-focused AI hardware buildout.

item.title: Amazon to shut down speedy brick-and-mortar delivery service
item.description: The company has stopped any new development of the service, called Amazon Today, and will begin to wind it down, according to people familiar with the...

item.title: Crypto firm Circle expects the UK to introduce stablecoin laws in 'months, not years'
item.description: "I think we're within months, not years" of formal U.K. stablecoin laws being introduced, crypto firm Circle's top policy executive told CNBC.

item.title: Lilium was once a promising 'air taxi' startup worth billions. Now it's on the brink of insolvency
item.description: German aerospace startup Lilium faces insolvency if it doesn't raise emergency funding from the state government for the southeastern state of Bavaria...

item.title: Qualcomm shares fall 5% after report of Arm threat to scrap key license in escalating dispute
item.description: Qualcomm shares fell in premarket trade after Bloomberg reported that British chip designer Arm is looking to scrap a key license for the U.S. firm.

item.title: Treasury yields rising on potential ‚Äòred wave‚Äô election result that pushes up deficit
item.description: Billionaires are betting against U.S. government bonds. But yields are climbing on good news about the economy, too.

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield hovers near 4.2%, its highest level since late July
item.description: The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield extended gains early Tuesday after hitting its highest level since late July.

item.title: Stock futures slide as Treasury yields tick higher once again: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures fell on Wednesday after the S&P 500 posted its first back-to-back loss since early September, while Treasury yields moved higher.
